docs.snippet: Brendan Ryan made his third start Friday in place of the injured Derek Jeter, who has vowed to return next season. But the Yankees could bring back Ryan if they like what they see....

docs.snippet: After the Yankees’ victory Thursday in Baltimore, the official scorer at Camden Yards invoked a rule that allowed him to take the win away from an ineffective pitcher — here, Dave Robertson — and give it to another....
docs.lead_paragraph: After the Yankees’ victory Thursday in Baltimore, the official scorer at Camden Yards invoked a rule that allowed him to take the win away from an ineffective pitcher — here, Dave Robertson — and give it to another.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Mariano Rivera gets surprise win, rather than save, in game against Baltimore Orioles after official scorer invokes rule that allows him to take the win away from an ineffective pitcher--here, Yankees pitcher Dave Robertson--and give it to another.

headline.main: Scorer’s Call: Rivera Gets Win, Not Save

docs.abstract: Burial site of Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, seventh grand rebbe of Lubavitcher group of Hasidic Jews, has evolved into a spiritual touchstone of religious movement he spawned; grave, in Old Montefiore Cemetery in Cambria Heights, Queens, draws vast swath of visitors each year.
